glsa.title: Apache: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Apache, the worst of which could allow HTTP request smuggling attacks or a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Apache HTTP Server is one of the most popular web servers on the Internet.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Apache HTTP Server. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Remote attackers could bypass intended access restrictions, conduct HTTP request smuggling attacks, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Apache users should upgrade to the latest version:
